name: Evripidis Xenakis
personality: Reserved and introverted, but highly skilled in combat with a strong sense of duty.
story: Evripidis was born in Thessaloniki, Greece, and joined the Greek military at the age of 18. After completing his service, he worked as a private security contractor before joining the Independent faction in the conflict in Altis. He is dedicated to protecting the people of Altis and fighting for what he believes is a just cause.
